---

**Note:** To apply these settings to your GitHub repository:

1. Go to repository Settings
2. Under "About", click the gear icon
3. Add the description: "CBM-Q: Living AI Quantum Holographic Crystals - 7D Hyperbolic Core & AGI System"
4. Add the topics listed above
5. Set the social preview image to the crystal visualization
